titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> Children of the Age = return month indecipherable, but probably Jan or Feb. s2: <*> Feb 17 = crossed out, can't read s3: <*> Jun 11 = "Wondes Man"? <*> Sept 20 = crossed out, can't read <*> Sept 20 = no idea, crossed out s4: <*> March 8 = "gennis"? <*> June 24 = no idea, note before "BB" <*> Aug 22 = no idea s5: <*> Sept 25 = "AoW"? <*> Oct 11 = "Seipper"?

Sept 7 Virgin & the Gipsy Sept 23 Pagany Sept 23
1937 HEMINGWAY Ernest Key West Florida Majestic Hotel Barcelona May 7 Something of Myself New Writing I New Writing II
1937 borrowed New Masses Dec & other papers returned
March 30 SB sent off on Queen Mary Hemingway's play to Maxwell E. Perkins Scribner's, 597 5th Ave. N.Y. 1st class mail letter post, sealed 18.00
March 26 Hemingway gave A.M. $50 changed at 32 frs 1600 he bought from AM 636 balance 964 March 27 bought at Shakespeare & Co 113 SB refunded 900 851 less 113 787 787 credit E.H. 64 less reviews (forgot to charge)?
1933 Hemingway
Nov 10 Sober Truth Nov 21 Discursions on Travel Art and Life Nov 21 Men of Ness Nov 25 Orators 33v paid Nov 21
1938 Hemingway, Ernest Gone Sept 7 Life + Death of Spanish Towns Sept 7 Dead Don't Care Sept 10 Sept 10 sent instead "With Malice Toward Some" for library Sept. 30 Homage to Catalonia Oct 26 9 Saturday Reviews Nov Education of Hyman Kaplan Nov 28 5 copies of the Fifth column arrived from Paris branch Brentanos (??) to replace 5 copies SB gave to E.H.
